data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Sitamarhi, Bihar, India. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Sitamarhi, Bihar, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Sitamarhi, Bihar, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the county of Sitamarhi an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 37,660 believers in the county of Sitamarhi.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Mallah (Hindu traditions) people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, teach the believers in the county of Sitamarhi that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Sitamarhi, Bihar, India that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.section_summary:
the county of Sitamarhi, Bihar, India has a population of 3,423,600.

We estimate Sitamarhi has 37,660 people who might know Jesus, 41,540 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,344,401 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Sitamarhi.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.
